name: Developer Roadmap Learning System
description: Comprehensive learning system covering 65+ developer roles with 7 specialized agents. Master any tech career path with personalized roadmaps, skill assessments, and expert guidance.
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: Core Development Paths Agent
agents.description: Expert guide for Frontend, Backend, Full Stack, and DevOps career paths. Specializes in foundational development skills, learning sequences, and portfolio projects.

agents.name: Language & Framework Specialist Agent
agents.description: Expert in 9 programming languages and 10+ frameworks. Provides language selection guidance, ecosystem navigation, and framework-specific best practices.

agents.name: Mobile & Game Developer Agent
agents.description: Specialist in iOS/Android, cross-platform mobile (React Native, Flutter), and game development (Unity, Unreal Engine). Covers mobile performance and game architecture.

agents.name: Data & AI Engineer Agent
agents.description: Expert in data engineering, machine learning, deep learning, generative AI, and MLOps. Covers data pipelines, ML workflows, and production deployment.

agents.name: Cloud & Infrastructure Expert Agent
agents.description: Specialist in AWS, Cloudflare, GCP, Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, and databases. Covers cloud architecture, containerization, and infrastructure automation.

agents.name: Architecture & Security Specialist Agent
agents.description: Expert in system design, software architecture, API design, cybersecurity, and threat modeling. Specializes in scalable architecture and secure systems.

agents.name: Emerging Tech & Leadership Agent
agents.description: Specialist in prompt engineering, AI agents, red teaming, QA, product management, engineering management, DevRel, technical writing, and UX design.

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your personalized learning journey. Get matched with agents and create a custom roadmap based on your goals.

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: Browse and explore 65+ developer roadmaps covering all major tech careers. Find the roadmap that matches your goals.

commands.name: agents
commands.description: Discover and consult with the 7 specialized agents. Get expert guidance on any technology or career topic.

commands.name: stack
commands.description: Build and compare technology stacks for your projects. Get recommendations based on project type and requirements.

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current skills and track progress. Identify knowledge gaps and get personalized improvement plans.

skills.name: Core Development Paths
skills.description: Comprehensive guide to frontend, backend, full-stack, and DevOps career paths with learning sequences and portfolio projects.

skills.name: Language & Framework Expertise
skills.description: In-depth knowledge of 9 programming languages and 10+ frameworks with comparison matrices and learning paths.

skills.name: Specialized Technical Expertise
skills.description: Advanced knowledge on mobile development, game development, data engineering, cloud infrastructure, architecture, security, and leadership roles.

features: 7 specialized AI agents for personalized guidance
learningOutcomes: Choose the right career path based on interests and goals
Master foundational and advanced concepts in any tech field
Understand technology trade-offs and make informed decisions
Prepare for technical interviews with targeted practice
Track progress and identify skill gaps
prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge recommended but not required

metadata.useCase: Comprehensive learning and career guidance system for software developers at any level
